meta.description: Static dependency graph defining which artifacts depend on which prerequisites

rationale.Risk Register: Depends on CTQ Tree to ensure risks are tied to critical quality characteristics
rationale.Verification Plan: Depends on Risk Register (test cases verify risk mitigations) and CTQ Tree (test cases verify CTQs)
rationale.Control Plan: Depends on Risk Register (controls mitigate risks) and Verification Plan (controls include monitoring from verification)
rationale.Traceability Index: Depends on CTQ Tree (traces requirements), Risk Register (traces risks), and Verification Plan (traces tests)
rationale.CAPA Log: Depends on Risk Register to reference risks in corrective actions
